section_one.title: Welcome to our website
section_one.description: We are here to help you with all your insurance needs

hero_section.title: Get to know us
hero_section.paragraph: Our mission is to help you find the best insurance at the best price, with the coverage you need, among the offers of our insurance partners. We are committed to providing you with the best insurance experience, with the best service and the best advice.

why_choose_us_with_contact_form.title: Why Choose Us
why_choose_us_with_contact_form.paragraph1: We make it easy to compare rates, cover and conditions of different policies etc
why_choose_us_with_contact_form.paragraph2: We are committed to providing you with the best insurance experience, with the best service and the best advice
why_choose_us_with_contact_form.paragraph3: Using Our Comparator ensures that you do not over-look any relevant options as we provide you with all the options you may need.
